00001 subroutine param_dump
00002 
00003   use physvars
00004   use utils
00005   implicit none
00006   integer :: ibig, machinebits, ifile
00007 
00008 
00009   if (my_rank==0) then
00010      do ifile = 6,15,9
00011 
00012         write (ifile,'(a20,i4,a11)') ' System config: ',system_config,plasma_configs(system_config)
00013         write (ifile,'(a20,i4,a11)') ' Target geometry: ',target_geometry,geometries(target_geometry)
00014         write (ifile,'(a20,i4,a8)') ' Scheme: ',scheme,schemes(scheme)
00015         write (ifile,'(a20,1pe12.3)') ' System volume: ',Vplas
00016         write (ifile,'(a20,f12.3)') ' Sphere radius: ',r_sphere
00017         write (ifile,'(a20,f12.3)') ' System length: ',x_plasma
00018         write (ifile,'(a20,f12.3)') ' System width: ',y_plasma
00019         write (ifile,'(a20,f12.3)') ' System height: ',z_plasma
00020         write (ifile,'(a20,1pe12.3)') ' Electron charge: ',qe
00021         write (ifile,'(a20,1pe12.3)') ' Electron mass: ',mass_e
00022         write (ifile,'(a20,1pe12.3)') ' Ion mass: ',mass_i
00023         write (ifile,'(a20,f12.3)') ' Te: ',Te_keV
00024         write (ifile,'(a20,f12.3)') ' Ti: ',Ti_keV
00025         write (ifile,'(a20,1pe12.3)') ' Debye length: ',vte
00026         if (ramp) then
00027            write (ifile,'(a20,f12.3)') ' n_min: ', rho_min
00028            write (ifile,'(a20,f12.3)') ' k_p L: ', lolam
00029            write (ifile,'(a20,f12.3)') ' x_sol: ', plasma_centre(1)-x_plasma/2.+lolam*(1-rho_min)
00030 
00031         endif
00032 
00033         write (ifile,'(a20,f12.4)') ' Ion spacing a: ',a_ii
00034         write (ifile,'(a20,f12.3)') ' Cloud radius R: ',eps
00035        
00036 
00037         write (ifile,'(a20,i12)') ' # dt per cycle: ',navcycle
00038 
00039         write (ifile,'(a20,1pe12.3)') ' N_D: ',4*pi/3.*(vte/a_ii)**3
00040         write (ifile,'(a20,f12.3)') ' N_c: ',4*pi/3.*(eps/a_ii)**3
00041         write (ifile,'(a20,f12.3)') ' R/lambda_De: ',eps/vte
00042         write (ifile,'(a20,f12.3)') ' Timestep: ',dt
00043         write (ifile,'(a20,f12.3)') ' Max timestep: ',0.45*sqrt(3.)*eps**2/abs(qe)*vte
00044 
00045         write (ifile,'(a20,1pe12.3)') ' Neighbour search radius: ',r_neighbour
00046         write (ifile,'(a20,f12.3)') ' MAC theta: ',theta
00047         write (ifile,'(a20,1pe12.3)') ' Particle # ratio: ',4.e6*lambda*omega*abs(qe)
00048 
00049         write (ifile,'(a,f9.2,a3,f9.2,a3,f9.2/)') ' Graphics box: ',xl,' x ',yl,' x ',zl
00050 
00051 
00052         write (ifile,*) ' Electrons: ', ne
00053         write (ifile,*) ' Ions: ', ni
00054  !       write (ifile,*) ' Beam particles: ', np_beam
00055  !      write (ifile,*) ' Beam angles ',theta_beam, phi_beam
00056         write (ifile,*) ' Particles per PE: ', npp
00057 
00058 
00059         write (ifile,'(/a/a)') ' Switches:','--------'
00060         write (ifile,'(a20,l3)') ' Coulomb forces: ',coulomb
00061         write (ifile,'(a20,l3)') ' Lennard-Jones forces: ',lenjones
00062 
00063 
00064         if (debug_level>=1) then
00065            write (ifile,'(/a)') 'Other inputs:'
00066 !           write(ifile,NML=pepcdata)
00067         else 
00068            write (15,'(/a)') 'Other inputs:'
00069 !           write(15,NML=pepcdata)
00070         endif

00073         !  ibig = 2**63 - 1
